title: Sri Lanka can tap Chinese and Indian middle classes, says Packer
content: (Reuters) – Sri Lanka could be turned into a preferred destination for wealthy Indian and Chinese tourists, said Australian gambling tycoon James Packer on Wednesday as he promoted his plan to develop a $400 million dollar casino resort in Colombo.
